response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This product, which is worth $1,000,000 to you, is being offered to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. I understand the importance of making a fair deal and believe this offer presents a great balance between value and affordability. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 950000}
